articles.title: Dave Ramsey To Millennial Making $30K A Year Criticizing Jay-Z's Extravagant Spending: 'You Are Jealous' – 'That's Lazy And Self-Entitled'
articles.mainIdea: Dave Ramsey To Millennial Making $30K A Year Criticizing Jay-Z's Extravagant Spending: 'You Are Jealous' – 'That's Lazy And Self-Entitled'
articles.summary: Benzinga: Dave Ramsey To Millennial Making $30K A Year Criticizing Jay-Z's Extravagant Spending: 'You Are Jealous' – 'That's Lazy And Self-Entitled'. Dave Ramsey says people should stop judging how others spend their money and focus instead on managing their own finances and increasing their income. Talking about public reaction to rapper Jay-Z spending $110,000 in one night at a bar for a friend

articles.title: Warren Buffett Stopped Giving His Family $10,000 Cash At Christmas: Here's What The Billionaire Gives Them Now Instead
articles.mainIdea: Warren Buffett Stopped Giving His Family $10,000 Cash At Christmas: Here's What The Billionaire Gives Them Now Instead
articles.summary: Benzinga: Warren Buffett Stopped Giving His Family $10,000 Cash At Christmas: Here's What The Billionaire Gives Them Now Instead. Warren Buffett, the legendary CEO of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE:BRK) (NYSE:BRK), gave family members $10,000 in cash for Christmas for years. After he saw it spent on wants, he switched to something that he believed would be treasured far more. Cash Gifts Vanished Fast After Christmas Buffett Related tickers mentioned: BRK.A.

articles.title: SOXL vs. QLD: Two Ways to Leverage Tech, With Very Different Stakes
articles.mainIdea: SOXL vs. QLD: Two Ways to Leverage Tech, With Very Different Stakes
articles.summary: Motley Fool: SOXL vs. QLD: Two Ways to Leverage Tech, With Very Different Stakes. Both ETFs amplify technology gains, yet QLD leans on broad growth leadership while SOXL turns semiconductor cycles and daily leverage resets into the defining driver of returns Related tickers mentioned: SOXL.
